price: 11. Y entre nosotros hay quienes son rectos y virtuosos y quienes no. Somos grupos distintos y cada uno sigue su propio camino.
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-annā minnā al-ṣāliḥūna waminnā dūna dhālika kunnā ṭarāiqa qidadan
